page.title: 11A Day in the life of Joanna
page.content: I am 10 years old and live on Poolhouse Rd. I get up at 7.30am. every morning, dress, go downstairs and feed my fish, George,Nellie,and Abby, then myself. Dadfeeds the hens and walks the dogs.By 8.00am. my sister Caroline has come down and mummy gone to school.We clear table and vacuum the parlour. We play on our old air-raid shelter until Sam, Oliver and Christopher come round.We all get into the Landrover and rumble off to school.I stay for school dinner. We have a choice menu. At playtimes I tell myself stories or play "He-man" with my friends Jo and Elizabeth.Other girls play games like Tig,Rollerboot skating,dolls and skipping.The boys play football in winter and cricket or rounders with the girls in summer. Some play with boy dolls. When I get home I am tired.
